business_strategies.strategy: Phase-based payment structure instead of upfront payments
business_strategies.implementation: Divide projects into phases to manage client expectations
business_strategies.expected_results: Lower client expectations, better project management
business_strategies.case_study: When taking payment upfront, expectations become too high

business_strategies.strategy: Pivot from failed business model to AI automation agency
business_strategies.implementation: Leverage existing technical skills in new market opportunity
business_strategies.expected_results: Rapid revenue growth from 0 to 60-70k in 7 months
business_strategies.case_study: Failed cybersecurity tool pivoted to successful AI agency

problems_solutions.solution: Direct communication and proving value through results
steps: Address age concerns directly with prospects

problems_solutions.problem: High client expectations with upfront payments

startup_ideas.validation: Multiple case studies showing 60-70k revenue in 7 months
startup_ideas.investment_needed: Technical skills and business development capabilities

mistakes_to_avoid.mistake: Taking full payment upfront from clients
mistakes_to_avoid.example: Speaker learned this through experience and switched to phases

mistakes_to_avoid.mistake: Sticking with failing business model for too long
mistakes_to_avoid.consequences: Three years of struggle with cybersecurity tool
mistakes_to_avoid.prevention: Be willing to pivot when market signals aren't positive
mistakes_to_avoid.example: Spent 3 years failing at cybersecurity tool before successful pivot
